name: POTION_Healing_Poisoned_Masked_Minor_A
description: A potion that restores your vitality. It makes a soft tinkling sound when you shake it.

name: POTION_Healing_Poisoned_Masked_Medium_A
description: A medium-sized potion that restores your vitality. It makes a soft, tinkling sound when you shake it.

name: POTION_Healing_Poisoned_Masked_Large_A
description: A large-sized potion that restores your vitality. It makes a soft, tinkling sound when you shake it.

name: POTION_Healing_Poisoned_Masked_Huge_A
description: A very large-sized potion that restores your vitality. It makes a soft, tinkling sound when you shake it.

name: POTION_Source_Potion
description: Glistening with potential, this liquid Source is redolent of dawn dew. Drinking it will do more than quench your thirst; it will replenish your Source powers.

name: POTION_Minor_Healing_Potion
description: A potion that restores your vitality. It makes a soft tinkling sound when you shake it.

name: POTION_Medium_Healing_Potion
description: A medium-sized potion that restores your vitality. It makes a soft, tinkling sound when you shake it.

name: POTION_Large_Healing_Potion
description: A large-sized potion that restores your vitality. It makes a soft, tinkling sound when you shake it.

name: POTION_Huge_Healing_Potion
description: A very large-sized potion that restores your vitality. It makes a soft, tinkling sound when you shake it.

name: POTION_Giant_Healing_Potion
description: A very, very large-sized potion that restores your vitality. It makes a soft, tinkling sound when you shake it.

name: POTION_Healing_Elixir
description: A healing elixir brewed with the yarrow flower. Supposedly superior to the common healing potion.

name: POTION_Permanent_Healing_Potion
description: A large-sized potion that restores your vitality. It makes a soft, tinkling sound when you shake it.

name: CON_Potion_MagicArmor_Boost_A
description: A potion that enchants and strengthens your magical armour.

name: CON_Potion_MagicArmor_Boost_Medium_A
description: A medium-sized potion that enchants and strengthens your magical armour.

name: CON_Potion_MagicArmor_Boost_Large_A
description: A large-sized potion that enchants and strengthens your magical armour.

name: CON_Potion_MagicArmor_Boost_Giant_A
description: A very large-sized potion that enchants and strengthens your magical armour.

name: CON_Potion_PhysicalArmor_Boost_A
description: A potion that enchants and strengthens your physical armour.

name: CON_Potion_PhysicalArmor_Boost_Medium_A
description: A medium-sized potion that enchants and strengthens your physical armour.

name: CON_Potion_PhysicalArmor_Boost_Large_A
description: A large-sized potion that enchants and strengthens your physical armour.

name: CON_Potion_PhysicalArmor_Boost_Giant_A
description: A very large-sized potion that enchants and strengthens your physical armour.

name: CON_Potion_Poison_A
description: Contrived from the scum of Rivellon's vilest troll's feet, witch's gums, and demon dung, this poison could take down an average-sized wollock.

name: CON_Potion_Poison_Medium_A
description: Contrived from the scum of Rivellon's vilest troll's feet, witch's gums, and demon dung, this poison could take down a medium-sized wollock.

name: CON_Potion_Poison_Large_A
description: Contrived from the scum of Rivellon's vilest troll's feet, witch's gums, and demon dung, this poison could take down a large-sized wollock.

name: CON_Potion_Poison_Huge_A
description: Contrived from the scum of Rivellon's vilest troll's feet, witch's gums, and demon dung, this poison could take down a large-sized wollock.

name: CON_Potion_Poison_Giant_A
description: Contrived from the scum of Rivellon's vilest troll's feet, witch's gums, and demon dung, this poison could take down a large-sized wollock.

name: CON_Potion_Poison_Elixir
description: A poison elixir brewed with the yarrow flower. Supposedly superior to common poison.

name: POTION_Minor_Strength_Potion
description: This small-sized, strength-enhancing brew still smells of the troll whose sweat grants it its magical properties.

name: POTION_Medium_Strength_Potion
description: This medium-sized, strength-enhancing brew still smells of the troll whose sweat grants it its magical properties.

name: POTION_Large_Strength_Potion
description: This large-sized, strength-enhancing brew still smells of the troll whose sweat grants it its magical properties.

name: POTION_Permanent_Strength_Potion
description: This large-sized, strength-enhancing brew still smells of the troll whose sweat grants it its magical properties.

name: POTION_Minor_Dexterity_Potion
description: A thick, cloudy drink that sharpens the Finesse of the drinker.

name: POTION_Medium_Dexterity_Potion
description: A medium-sized, thick, and cloudy drink that sharpens the dexterity of the drinker.

name: POTION_Large_Dexterity_Potion
description: A large-sized, thick, and cloudy drink that sharpens the dexterity of the drinker.

name: POTION_Permanent_Dexterity_Potion
description: A large-sized, thick, and cloudy drink that sharpens the dexterity of the drinker.

name: POTION_Minor_Speed_Potion
description: Infused with falcons' tears, this elixir infuses its drinker with superior speed.

name: POTION_Medium_Speed_Potion
description: Infused with falcons' tears, this medium-sized elixir infuses its drinker with superior speed.

name: POTION_Large_Speed_Potion
description: Infused with falcons' tears, this large-sized elixir infuses its drinker with superior speed.

name: POTION_Permanent_Speed_Potion
description: Infused with falcons' tears, this large-sized elixir infuses its drinker with superior speed.

name: POTION_Minor_Intelligence_Potion
description: This potion smells faintly of old books and is capable of boosting your intelligence.

name: POTION_Medium_Intelligence_Potion
description: This medium-sized potion smells faintly of old books and is capable of boosting your intelligence.

name: POTION_Large_Intelligence_Potion
description: This large-sized potion smells faintly of old books and is capable of boosting your intelligence.

name: POTION_Permanent_Intelligence_Potion
description: This large-sized potion smells faintly of old books and is capable of boosting your intelligence.

name: POTION_Minor_Constitution_Potion
description: A small-sized potion that fortifies your constitution by scrubbing your insides from top to bottom.

name: POTION_Medium_Constitution_Potion
description: A medium-sized potion that fortifies your constitution by scrubbing your insides from top to bottom.

name: POTION_Large_Constitution_Potion
description: A large-sized potion that fortifies your constitution by scrubbing your insides from top to bottom.

name: POTION_Permanent_Constitution_Potion
description: A large-sized potion that fortifies your constitution by scrubbing your insides from top to bottom.

name: POTION_Minor_Perception_Potion
description: The fluorescent liquid in this vial looks more radioactive than potable, but its affect on one's perception is undeniable.

name: POTION_Medium_Perception_Potion
description: The fluorescent liquid in this medium-sized vial looks more radioactive than potable, but its affect on one's perception is undeniable.

name: POTION_Large_Perception_Potion
description: The fluorescent liquid in this large vial looks more radioactive than potable, but its affect on one's perception is undeniable.

name: POTION_Permanent_Perception_Potion
description: The fluorescent liquid in this large vial looks more radioactive than potable, but its affect on one's perception is undeniable.

name: CON_Potion_Fire_Res_A
description: A bright-smelling, spicy elixir capable of protecting you against pyrokinetic attacks.

name: CON_Potion_Fire_Res_Medium_A
description: A medium-sized, bright-smelling, spicy elixir capable of protecting you against pyrokinetic attacks.

name: CON_Potion_Fire_Res_Large_A
description: A large-sized, bright-smelling, spicy elixir capable of protecting you against pyrokinetic attacks.

name: CON_Potion_Water_Res_A
description: This potion, a beautiful, swirling concoction smelling faintly of coconuts, grants resistance to water damage.

name: CON_Potion_Water_Res_Medium_A
description: This medium-sized potion, a beautiful, swirling concoction smelling faintly of coconuts, grants resistance to water damage.

name: CON_Potion_Water_Res_Large_A
description: This large potion, a beautiful, swirling concoction smelling faintly of coconuts, grants resistance to water damage.

name: CON_Potion_Air_Res_A
description: A potion capable of steeling you against the effects of air magic.

name: CON_Potion_Air_Res_Medium_A
description: A medium-sized potion capable of steeling you against the effects of air magic.

name: CON_Potion_Air_Res_Large_A
description: A large-sized potion capable of steeling you against the effects of air magic.

name: CON_Potion_Poison_Res_A
description: This floral-scented potion is commonly called 'King's Pal'. It grants its drinker a gentle resistance to poisoning.

name: CON_Potion_Poison_Res_Medium_A
description: This floral-scented potion is commonly called 'King's Pal'. It grants its drinker somewhat of a  resistance to poisoning.

name: CON_Potion_Poison_Res_Large_A
description: This floral-scented potion is commonly called 'King's Pal'. It grants its drinker a considerable resistance to poisoning.

name: CON_Potion_Earth_Res_A
description: A protective potion that can fortify you against geomantic attacks.

name: CON_Potion_Earth_Res_Medium_A
description: A medium-sized protective potion that can fortify you against geomantic attacks.

name: CON_Potion_Earth_Res_Large_A
description: A large-sized protective potion that can fortify you against geomantic attacks.

name: POTION_Minor_ResistAll_Potion
description: This fortifying brew may reek of sour milk, but one gulp will grant you a minor resistance to all types of elemental magic.

name: POTION_Medium_ResistAll_Potion
description: This fortifying brew may reek of sour milk, but one gulp will grant you a minor resistance to all types of elemental magic.

name: POTION_Large_ResistAll_Potion
description: This fortifying brew may reek of sour milk, but one gulp will grant you a minor resistance to all types of elemental magic.

name: CON_Potion_Air_Res_Huge_A
description: A very large-sized potion capable of steeling you against the effects of air magic.

name: CON_Potion_Poison_Res_Huge_A
description: This floral-scented potion is commonly called 'King's Pal'. It grants its drinker a great resistance to poisoning.

name: CON_Potion_Earth_Res_Huge_A
description: A very large-sized protective potion that can fortify you against geomantic attacks.

name: CON_Potion_Water_Res_Huge_A
description: This very large potion, a beautiful, swirling concoction smelling faintly of coconuts, grants resistance to water damage.

name: CON_Potion_Fire_Res_Huge_A
description: A very large-sized, bright-smelling, spicy elixir capable of protecting you against pyrokinetic attacks.

name: CON_Potion_Invisible_A
description: This elixir temporarily coats you in an invisibility spell. The bottle appears to be empty, but...

name: CON_Potion_Invisible_Medium_A
description: This elixir temporarily coats you in an invisibility spell. The medium-sized bottle appears to be empty, but...

name: CON_Potion_Invisible_Large_A
description: This elixir temporarily coats you in an invisibility spell. The large bottle appears to be empty, but...

name: CON_Potion_Stoneskin
description: | Stoneskin potion description |

name: CON_Potion_NimbleTumble
description: | Nimble Tumble potion description |

name: CON_Potion_Will
description: | Potion of strong will description |

name: CON_Potion_ElectricSkin
description: | Electric skin potion description |

name: CON_Potion_Telekinesis_A
description: This bottle, containing a potion capable of granting telekinesis to its drinker, seems to jump within your hand.

name: CON_Potion_Telekinesis_Medium_A
description: This bottle, containing a medium-sized potion capable of granting telekinesis to its drinker, seems to jump within your hand.

name: CON_Potion_Telekinesis_Large_A
description: This bottle, containing a large-sized potion capable of granting telekinesis to its drinker, seems to jump within your hand.

name: CON_Potion_Debuf_Strength_A
description: A vile-scented draught capable of softening your strength.

name: CON_Potion_Debuf_Dexterity_A
description: A vile-scented draught capable of weighing down your dexterity.

name: CON_Potion_Debuf_Intelligence_A
description: A vile-scented draught capable of dulling your intelligence.

name: CON_Potion_Debuf_Constitution_A
description: A vile-scented draught capable of draining your constitution.

name: CON_Potion_Debuf_Speed_A
description: A vile-scented draught capable of dialling your speed down to 'tortoise'.

name: CON_Potion_Debuf_Perception_A
description: A vile-scented draught capable of dimming your perception.

name: CON_Potion_Debuf_All_A
description: A vile-scented draught capable of enfeebling you completely.

name: LOOT_Source_Orb
description: Glowing brightly with a spectral blue brilliance, it almost hurts to gaze at it too long. This Source Orb can be used to gain a Source Point, or used in place of a rune on your equipment, or used as an ingredient in special crafting recipes. Use it wisely!

name: CON_Herb_Mushroom_A
description: A standard forest mushroom, rumoured by elder Wayfarers to possess healing powers.

name: CON_Herb_Mushroom_C
description: Just a friendly little poisonous toadstool, minding its own business.

name: CON_Herb_Whisperwood_A
description: Elven elders claim that those who can understand the secrets whispered by this herb will be protected by the blessing of Tir-Cendelius himself.

name: CON_Nature_Mushroom_Amadouvier_A
description: Likened to armour for its scaly appearance, Amadouvier is a particularly tough strain of fungus, highly sought after by potion brewers.

name: CON_Herb_Mushroom_B
description: Bluegill mushrooms often flourish close to water, where they can be seen bunched together conspiratorially.

name: CON_Herb_Mushroom_Jellyfish_A
description: Children's stories tell that the origin of this mushroom's glow comes from being struck by lightning. Of course, modern scholars laugh at such tales. But their laughter rings hollow, for even they don't know why the jellyroom glows.

name: CON_Herb_Mushroom_D
description: This invasive fungus is sturdier than a rock, so much so that it was used as armour by elves of ancient times.

name: CON_Herb_Mushroom_E
description: A vibrant and robust species, this mushroom is a prized ingredient of fire alchemists.

name: CON_Herb_Augmentor_A
description: This plant is widely valued for its decorative property, but potion brewers know better.

name: CON_Herb_Augmentor_Step2_A
description: This plant is widely valued for its decorative property, but potion brewers know better.

name: CON_Herb_Augmentor_Step3_A
description: This plant is widely valued for its decorative property, but potion brewers know better.

name: CON_Herb_Farhangite_A
description: Hard as nails and twice as chewy, this rare plant thrives on the tears of exhausted adventurers.

name: CON_Nature_Mushroom_AmethystDeceiver_A
description: This unusually strong mushroom has an unusually strong taste to match.

name: CON_Nature_Mushroom_Boletus_A
description: Often chewed by archers before battle to still their shaking hands, this mushroom is colloquially known as "Hunter's Breakfast".

name: CON_Nature_Mushroom_Calocera_A
description: A mushroom that's notoriously forbidden in most wizard universities.

name: CON_Nature_Mushroom_Chanterelle_A
description: Hard to see unless you look at it out of the corner of your eye. It's as if this mushroom is desperately trying to go unnoticed.

name: CON_Nature_Mushroom_Puffball_A
description: Legend holds that these mushrooms are the eyeballs of the dead, poking up from the earth to see what they are missing in their graves.

name: CON_Nature_Mushroom_TrumpetOfDeath_A
description: A rare breed of plant that is often seen as a harbinger of doom for others, though it can survive all types of weather itself. Cultivated as a household shrub by the fearless.

name: CON_Herb_Mushroom_F
description: A luminous fungus that thrives anywhere it can bask in the silvery light of the moon.

name: CON_Nature_Mushroom_FlyAgaric_A
description: Just like a wizard's hat, this mushroom can hold more within it than meets the untrained eye.

name: CON_Herb_Drudanae
description: A controlled, highly addictive substance  capable of altering human consciousness.

name: CON_Herb_Drudanae_Griff
description: A controlled, highly addictive substance  capable of altering human consciousness.

name: CON_Herb_Drudanae_Addict
description: A controlled, highly addictive substance  capable of altering human consciousness.

name: CON_Herb_YarrowFlower
description: A pretty flower that grows like a weed in the lost and hidden corners of the world.

name: CON_Herb_BlackRose_A
description: A rare rose that grows only in killing fields. The crimson petals smell like putrescent flesh and filthy outhouses.

name: CON_Herb_NormalRose_A
description: The delicate scent of this rose's velvety petals is the perfect tonic for a road-weary adventurer's senses.

name: LOOT_Wheat_A
description: Grown in the Rivellonian Grain Belt, this wheat smells like the warm, earthy ground that grew it. Can be ground into a fine, high-quality flour.

name: LOOT_Bone_A
description: Most organic matter can be turned to purposes dark or light. Use with caution.

name: TOOL_Intestines_A
description: They slip through your fingers, leaving a slimy, pungent and oddly warm residue. Wait, why are you touching them?

name: CON_Food_Eggs_A
description: Some poor chicken went through a lot for this.

name: CON_Food_RottenEggs_A
description: Hide under the desk of anyone who's rude to you for guaranteed last laughs.

name: CON_Herb_Tea_A
description: Steeped in water, it makes a highly-prized drink with earthy, calming properties.

name: CON_Ingred_Dough_A
description: Like a newborn babe, this dough's potential is as vast as the imagination itself.

name: CON_Ingred_Dough_Apple_A
description: This dough is fairly bursting with its desire to be baked into a warm, comforting apple pie.

name: CON_Ingred_Dough_Pizza_A
description: This moist, fragrant dough is primed for a date with an oven.

name: CON_Ingred_Dough_CheeseBread_A
description: Equal parts savoury, soft, and tempting. Bake to bring it to crispy perfection.

name: CON_Ingred_Dough_Cyseal_A
description: It turns out you're no better at cooking than the Cysealians.

name: CON_Food_Pie_Apple_A
description: The signature dessert of the Dukedom of Ferol, apple pie is commonly referred to as 'Ferol tart' by locals.

name: CON_Food_BerryPie_A
description: Almost sweeter than your teeth can handle, this form of berry pie is commonly eaten by joyous pilgrims on their arrival in Arx for Lucian's Day.

name: CON_Food_BerryPie_B
description: Known as Amadia's Gift, this heavenly pie delights all who taste its sweet berry jam and marzipan crust.

name: CON_Food_Pizza_A
description: Widely considered a variation on the fare served in the Hall of Echoes.

name: CON_Food_Bread_Cheese_A
description: It'll go straight to your thighs, but it's worth every dimple.

name: CON_Food_Potato_Boiled_A
description: A humble but satisfying meal for the adventurer on the go.

name: CON_Food_Poutine_A
description: Widely considered a variation on the fare served in the Hall of Echoes.

name: CON_Food_Pie_Cyseal_A
description: A regional specialty known to make foreigners lose their faith in the gods.

name: CON_Food_Fries_Cold_A
description: A promising pile of cut potatoes, only a bit of hot oil away from perfection.

name: CON_Food_Fries_Rivellon_A
description: With Rivellon fries at the ready, you'll have more friends than the man with many cheeses.

name: CON_Food_Potato_Mash_Cold_A
description: Halfway to greatness; a little heat will take this simple meal to new heights.

name: CON_Food_Potato_Mash_A
description: A stick-to-your-bones, warm-you-through sort of meal.

name: CON_Food_Dinner_A
description: Best served to a pleasant companion alongside a  glass of something fresh.

name: CON_Food_Stew_A
description: This simple, gristly dish is considered a fine dessert among Dwarven circles.

name: QUEST_FunnyMeat
description: This simple, gristly dish is considered a fine dessert among Dwarven circles.

name: CON_Food_Stew_Dwarven_A
description: This simple, gristly dish is considered a fine dessert among Dwarven circles.

name: CON_Food_Soup_Pumpkin_A
description: Rich, creamy, and comfortingly warm.

name: CON_Food_Stew_Elven_A
description: Packed full of vegetables and unflavoured broth, this meal is typically served at Elven weddings and birthday celebrations.

name: CON_Food_Honey_Jar_A
description: Made by bees descended from the great and ancient Queen Lysandra.

name: CON_Porridge_A
description: Breakfast is the most important meal of the day. Eat up!

name: CON_Porridge_Potato_A
description: Considered a beverage by the hale and suicidal Dwarves of the frozen north.

name: CON_Drink_Cup_A_Apple
description: Fresh, sweet, and icy-cold.

name: CON_Drink_Cup_A_Orange
description: A cup a day keeps the scurvy at bay.

name: CON_Drink_Cup_A_Milk
description: Still warm from the udder.

name: CON_Food_MilkJug_A
description: What could possibly be more wholesome?

name: CON_Drink_Cup_A_MilkHoney
description: Legend has it that the Hall of Echoes runs with rivers of this sweet elixir.

name: CON_Drink_Cup_A_Oil
description: Avoid belching near open flames after consumption.

name: ITEM_BottleWithOil
description: A fine vintage, especially for a craft arsonist.

name: CON_Drink_Mug_A_Ambrosia
description: This so-called 'drink of the gods' smells more like a demon's jock strap.

name: CON_Food_Pie_Apple_A_Poisoned
description: Go on and have a slice. You deserve a long, long, long rest.

name: CON_Food_Pizza_A_Poisoned
description: Widely considered a variation on the fare served in the Hall of Echoes, though not even the gods could withstand this much deadly poison.

name: CON_Food_Bread_Cheese_A_Poisoned
description: It'd go straight to your thighs, but you'll die before it gets there.

name: CON_Food_Potato_Boiled_A_Poisoned
description: A humble but noxious meal for the adventurer on the go.

name: CON_Food_Pie_Cyseal_A_Poisoned
description: A poisoned fish pie? Talk about adding insult to injury.

name: CON_Food_Fries_Cold_A_Poisoned
description: A promising pile of cut, poisoned potatoes, only a bit of hot oil away from becoming the perfect weapon.

name: CON_Food_Fries_Rivellon_A_Poisoned
description: With poisoned Rivellon fries at the ready, you'll have more dead friends than the man with many poisoned cheeses.

name: CON_Food_Potato_Mash_Cold_A_Poisoned
description: Halfway to greatness; a little heat will take this poisoned meal to new heights.

name: CON_Food_Potato_Mash_A_Poisoned
description: A stick-to-your-bones, kill-you-dead sort of meal.

name: CON_Food_Dinner_A_Poisoned
description: Best served to a lifelong nemesis you've lulled into your confidences.

name: CON_Food_Stew_Dwarven_A_Poisoned
description: This simple, gristly dish is considered a fine dessert among Dwarves who want to murder each other.

name: CON_Food_Soup_Pumpkin_A_Poisoned
description: Rich, creamy, and comfortingly deadly.

name: CON_Food_Stew_Elven_A_Poisoned
description: Packed full of vegetables and poisoned broth, this meal is typically served by Elves who just can't stand each other a minute longer.

name: CON_Food_Honey_Jar_A_Poisoned
description: Made by bees descended from the great and ancient Queen Lysandra, then infused with deadly poison.

name: CON_Porridge_A_Poisoned
description: It's got everything you need to start a day of Source-smashing on the wrong foot.

name: CON_Porridge_Potato_A_Poisoned
description: Considered a beverage by the hale and suicidal Dwarves of the frozen north.

name: CON_Drink_Cup_A_Apple_Poisoned
description: Keep out of reach of thirsty children.

name: CON_Drink_Cup_A_Orange_Poisoned
description: Like watching a beautiful sunset just before getting shot in the neck with a poison dart.

name: CON_Drink_Cup_A_Milk_Poisoned
description: That cow must've hated you pretty badly.

name: CON_Drink_Cup_A_MilkHoney_Poisoned
description: One of these ingredients does not belong.

name: CON_Drink_Mug_A_Ambrosia_Poisoned
description: As if this devilish brew weren't noxious enough as it was...

name: CON_Drink_Mug_A_Blood
description: It's an acquired taste.

name: HAR_Shell
description: Although this shell is small and unassuming, a haunting past digestive experience urges you to cook it thoroughly before eating.

name: CON_Food_Carrot_A
description: A humble and steadfast vegetable.

name: CON_Food_Onion_A
description: A humble and steadfast vegetable.

name: CON_Food_Potato_A
description: Cook it. Cut it. Eat it. Love it.

name: FOOD_Apple
description: What could possibly be more wholesome?

name: CON_Food_Garlic
description: Hardy wayfarers will wax lyrical on the many esoteric uses of garlic. Truth is, they just like the taste of it roasted.

name: CON_Food_Grapes_A
description: Delicious. But every grape you eat now is a mouthful of wine stolen from your future self, so hide the stalks.

name: CON_Food_Lemon_A
description: They say lemons are good for scurvy, but you're pretty sure 'they' are a lemon-growing farming collective.

name: CON_Food_SalmonPie_A
description: Unless cooked by a wizard of a chef, this regional specialty could make even the devout lose their faith in the Seven.

name: CON_Food_WaterMelon
description: Nothing like watermelon for a taste of summer... and a mouthful of bees.

name: CON_Food_Tomato_A
description: Mother nature's most versatile fruit. Equally tasty raw, cooked, or smashed to bits and splashed on something else.

name: CON_Food_TomatoSauce_A
description: A simple vintage with notes of almond, cinnamon, and the winemaker's wasted youth.

name: CON_Food_Tomato_Soup_A
description: The result of a blessed union between tomato and hammer.

name: FOOD_Bread
description: Sun-soaked grains baked with love into a golden loaf.

name: FOOD_Cheese
description: With cheese in either hand, anything is possible.

name: FOOD_FishA
description: Is it just you, or is its eye.... Following you?

name: FOOD_FishB
description: A healthy specimen fresh-caught from the seas around Cyseal.

name: FOOD_FishC
description: It smells like hell, but it tastes like not starving to death.

name: FOOD_FishD
description: Hopefully it tastes better than it looks.

name: FOOD_FishE
description: It seems to cry out to be made into Cyseal pie.

name: FOOD_FishF
description: It's sailed all the seven seas; your belly is the last frontier.

name: FOOD_Ham
description: Looks like it could be pork meat... or is it wollock?

name: FOOD_Orange
description: Cultivated and exported from the equator by expert Lizard horticulturists.

name: FOOD_Orange_Fake
description: Cultivated and exported from the equator by expert Lizard horticulturists.

name: FOOD_Pear
description: After the Great Pear Famine, this small fruit is considered a delicacy among elite circles.

name: CON_Food_Meat_Raw_A
description: A chunky slab of bloody meat.

name: CON_Food_Meat_Cow_A
description: Sear to seal in all those delicious juices.

name: CON_Food_Meat_Ribs_A
description: Cooked Driftwood-style over an open flame, this meat is crispy-on-the-outside and tender-on-the-inside perfection.

name: CON_Food_Meat_BirdLeg_A
description: Sear to seal in all those delicious juices.

name: CON_Food_Meat_Giblets_A
description: This could have been anything that was once inside something. Or someone...

name: CON_Food_Meat_RabbitMeat_A
description: Sear to seal in all those delicious juices.

name: CON_Food_Meat_Mutton_A
description: Sear to seal in all those delicious juices.

name: FOOD_Pumpkin
description: A perfect, orange globe of possibilities.

name: FOOD_PumpkinPart
description: Someone's already pillaged this pumpkin's treasures.

name: FOOD_Pumpkin_C
description: Useless.

name: FOOD_RoastedPork
description: It's almost kind of cute, in a terribly morbid sort of way.

name: FOOD_RoastedPorkWithCarrot
description: It's almost kind of cute, in a terribly morbid sort of way.

name: POTION_HealingCrystal
description: A sparkling stone that winks at you when the light catches it. No, don't wink back.

name: LOOT_Ink_Pot_A
description: A jet-black ink made of ground soot and animal glue, awaiting only a quill to unleash its full potential.

name: FOOD_Poisoned_Cheese_A
description: With poisoned cheese in either hand, anything is possible (except living long enough to see your next birthday).

name: CON_Food_Carrot_A_Poisoned
description: A humble, steadfast, and deadly vegetable.

name: CON_Food_Potato_A_Poisoned
description: Cook it. Cut it. Eat it. Die.

name: FOOD_Apple_Poisoned
description: Preferred weapon of jealous hags and fratricidal worms.

name: CON_Food_Tomato_A_Poisoned
description: Mother nature's most versatile, deadly fruit. Equally tasty raw, cooked, or smashed to bits and splashed on something else.

name: FOOD_Bread_Poisoned
description: Sun-soaked grains baked with hatred into a poisoned loaf.

name: FOOD_FishA_Poisoned
description: And you thought it smelled bad before...

name: FOOD_FishB_Poisoned
description: And you thought it smelled bad before...

name: FOOD_FishC_Poisoned
description: And you thought it smelled bad before...

description: And you thought it smelled bad before...

name: FOOD_FishE_Poisoned
description: And you thought it smelled bad before...

name: FOOD_FishF_Poisoned
description: And you thought it smelled bad before...

name: FOOD_Ham_Poisoned
description: Looks like it could be pork meat... or is it wollock? Well, no matter; you'll die shortly after eating it either way.

name: FOOD_Orange_Poisoned
description: Cultivated and exported from the equator by expert Lizard horticulturists before being corrupted by poison.

name: FOOD_Pear_Poisoned
description: After the Great Pear Famine, this small fruit is considered a delicacy among elite circles. In its present condition, it could easily take out an entire bridge party.

name: FOOD_Pumpkin_Poisoned
description: A perfect, orange death-globe of possibilities.

name: FOOD_PumpkinPart_Poisoned
description: Someone's already pillaged and poisoned this pumpkin's treasures.

name: FOOD_Pumpkin_C_Poisoned
description: Consume for a dose of essential vitamins and poison, or find another use for it.

name: FOOD_RoastedPork_Poisoned
description: It's almost kind of cute, in a terribly morbid, deadly sort of way.

name: CON_Food_Tomato_Sauce_A_Poisoned
description: The result of a blessed union between tomato, hammer, and poison.

name: FOOD_FishD_Voidwoken
description: And you thought it smelled bad before...

description: And you thought it smelled bad before...

name: FOOD_FishF_Voidwoken
description: And you thought it smelled bad before...

name: FOOD_HotKettle_Fruit_A
description: | Special Fruit from the Kettle Plant, it is rumored that it adds fire inside anyone who will eat it |

name: CON_Drink_Bottle_Beer_A
description: Brewed to perfection in one of Rivellon's oldest monasteries.

name: CON_Drink_Bottle_Beer_A_Fancy
description: Brewed to perfection in one of Rivellon's oldest monasteries.

name: CON_Drink_Bottle_Wine_A
description: A simple vintage with notes of almond, cinnamon, and the winemaker's wasted youth.

name: CON_Drink_Bottle_Wine_A_Expensive
description: A simple vintage with notes of almond, cinnamon, and the winemaker's wasted youth.

name: CON_Drink_Bottle_Water_A
description: It's water. Putting it in a bottle doesn't make it any fancier.

name: CON_Drink_Mug_Beer_A
description: A heady brew with a layer of thick, creamy foam.

name: CON_Drink_Mug_Wine_A
description: For the refined oenophile.

name: CON_Drink_Mug_Water_A
description: A hydrated adventurer is a happy adventurer.

name: CON_Drink_Cup_A_Water
description: Just the thing for that dry spot at the back of your throat.

name: CON_Drink_Glass_A_Wine
description: A simple vintage with notes of almond, cinnamon, and the winemaker's wasted youth.

name: CON_Drink_Mug_A_Tea
description: A gentle blend of nettles and eastern herbs calms as it refreshes.

name: CON_Drink_Cup_A_Tea
description: Best enjoyed near the hearth on a rainy day.

name: CON_Drink_Bottle_Beer_A_Poisoned
description: Gods rest your poor, dear liver.

name: CON_Drink_Bottle_Wine_A_Poisoned
description: For a fancy party that'll really knock 'em dead.

name: CON_Drink_Bottle_Water_A_Poisoned
description: It'll quench your thirst for being alive.

name: CON_Drink_Mug_Wine_A_Poisoned
description: For a fancy party that'll really knock 'em dead.

name: CON_Drink_Mug_Water_A_Poisoned
description: This noxious drink will quench your thirst for being alive.

name: CON_Drink_Cup_A_Water_Poisoned
description: It'll quench your thirst for being alive.

name: CON_Drink_Mug_A_Beer_Poisoned
description: Gods rest your poor, dear liver.

name: CON_Drink_Glass_A_Wine_Poisoned
description: For a fancy party that'll really knock 'em dead.

name: CON_Drink_Mug_A_Tea_Poisoned
description: Granny's favourite murder weapon.

name: CON_Drink_Cup_A_Tea_Poisoned
description: Granny's favourite murder weapon.

name: CON_Drink_Bottle_Mud_A
description: Brewed to perfection in one of Rivellon's oldest swamps.

name: CON_Heart_Fiery
description: A magical heart fired in the forges of the dwarflands whose wind-blown flames can never be extinguished.

name: TOOL_Dye_Mystery
description: A magical, mysterious dye that can turn mere cloth scraps into something ... out of this world!

name: TOOL_Dye_Black
description: Molten midnight, dark as an endless witching hour.

name: TOOL_Dye_Blue
description: A deep turquoise pigment, vibrant as the harbour of Cyseal. Sniff it; it even smells like the sea. Ugh.

name: TOOL_Dye_Green
description: A luxurious dye, pressed from the grasses of Luculla Forest.

name: TOOL_Dye_Purple
description: Harvested from the rarest sea snails, this is a dye fit for kings.

name: TOOL_Dye_Red
description: A richly-hued dye siphoned from the blood of thousands of locusts.

name: TOOL_Dye_White
description: Smoking ominously, this dye will bleach anything to the hue of bone.

name: TOOL_Dye_Yellow
description: A kiss of sunlight, the brightest burnishing for your equipment.
